_source.text: 3 Pros : Drafted Brandin Cooks (my pick for offensive rookie of the year), drafted Stanley-Jean Baptiste to improve a better than expected secondary from a year ago, and signed Jairus Byrd. 3 Cons : Traded Darren Sproles to Philadelphia, lost center Brian De La Puente, and have questions about their running game.

text: Baptiste to improve a **better** **than** expected secondary from a year ago, and signed **Jairus** **Byrd**. 3 Cons
: Traded **Darren** **Sproles** to Philadelphia, lost center Brian De La Puente, and have questions about their running game.
